Soil classification deals with the systematic categorization of soils based on distinguishing characteristics as well as criteria that dictate choices in use. 
3 types of classification systems have been used in this application, namely, AASHTO, USCS and ISSCS. You can take a look at these systems here: 
1. AASHTO: http://goo.gl/0fMyEk 
2. USCS: http://goo.gl/3ck8MQ 
3. ISSCS: http://goo.gl/mNOh31 
and http://goo.gl/YN7iBn
